v3_140_news_main_array_item_1_subtitle: Design now indicates better when a tab is active.
v3_140_news_main_array_item_4_subtitle: Select to remove multiple users at the same time.
v3_140_news_main_array_item_5_title: Support video preview in JustDo files
v3_140_news_main_array_item_6_title: Show the user avatar in the Owner/Pending Owner columns
v3_140_news_features_update_items: 1. Color of secondary buttons changed from dark gray to light gray
3. Support sorting child tasks by the Follow Up field
4. A new modern font is now in use to better support non-english languages
5. Added the ability to hide the sidebar in the Site Admin
6. Design improvements to the reject ownership dialog (incl. ability to confirm submission with ctrl+enter)
v3_140_news_page_title: JustDo v3.140: Design Updates, Simplified User Invites & More
v3_140_news_page_description: JustDo v3.140 delivers design refinements, improved user invitation workflows, enhanced video support, and multiple usability enhancements.
